description.p: Descent is a classic first person shooter. You control a space-ship which is flying through a mine where the AI controlled robots have gone rogue. Your task is to fight the robots and rescue the human workers.
Descent is the first game featuring a full 3D environment. In Descent you control your space-ship with six degrees of freedom movement.

This version of Descent comes with the shareware version of the game. If you want to play the full (registered/commercial) version of the game, place the descent.hog and descent.pig data-files from your registered Descent version in /usr/share/d1x/full; or in $HOME/.d1x-rebirth.
